channel.title: Cheat Client For Gravity-Scape
channel.description: Can anyone make me a {WORKING} cheat client for this server called "gravityscape". It's #1 on rswebclients. I'm willing to pay $10 or even more if its really good. Comment if your interested. :) :)

item.title: Cheat Client For Gravity-Scape
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:9, topic:543350”][quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=662227.msg4426172#msg4426172 date=1400949666]
There is no cheat client that will work for any server because all servers are different. And like I said, packet validation would crush common cheat clients
[/quote]
Decompile someone’s client. Use their client to make the cheat client.
That way it sends the correct packets exactly how it should, but with whatever you wanted.
Holy mother of magic.[/quote]

That’s why I said common. hint hint nudge nudge

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat Client For Gravity-Scape

@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:9, topic:543350”][quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=662227.msg4426172#msg4426172 date=1400949666]
There is no cheat client that will work for any server because all servers are different. And like I said, packet validation would crush common cheat clients
[/quote]
Decompile someone’s client. Use their client to make the cheat client.
That way it sends the correct packets exactly how it should, but with whatever you wanted.
Holy mother of magic.[/quote]
There’s a similar cheat I know for 317 that uses something similar to make you admin. Works on most servers.

Read full topic

runescape sucks:

If a server is #1 on a list of any site(usually) they will have packet validation making it very hard to make a cheat client. So I doubt someone would do it for $10(and buying/selling isn’t allowed on this site)

Btyw Gravity scape has been offline
